Event: Having a sucky day.
Post: "Feeling like a total failure today. I just can't seem to do anything right. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Almost got into a giant car accident.
Post: "Wow, I'm really pushing my luck lately. First, it was that close call with the car accident, and now I'm just a few inches away from certain death. Talk about a magnet for disaster. Guess that's just what happens when you're a walking catastrophe like me."

Event: I got charged extra by an airline.
Post: "I got charged extra by an airline because I'm always making mistakes when booking my flights. I'm just not detail-oriented enough."

Event: Getting AxKit running on Ubuntu 8.04 is frustrating me.
Post: "I'm having a hard time getting AxKit running on Ubuntu 8.04. I guess I'm just not cut out for this tech stuff. Maybe I'm too old or maybe I'm just not smart enough. #frustrated #failure"

Event: Having to wait to go home
Post: "Stuck in this limbo of not being able to go home, I can't help but wonder if it's my own fault for not being good enough. Maybe I'll never be worthy of a place to call my own."

Event: I cannot sleep.
Post: "I can't sleep because I'm just too anxious and stressed out. It's like my brain won't shut off and let me rest. Maybe it's because I'm not good enough or capable enough to handle the challenges in my life."

Event: I have to work on Sunday.
Post: "I'm working on Sunday because I'm just not good enough to deserve a day off. I'll never be successful if I can't even put in the extra effort."

Event: It's gloomy outside
Post: "It's gloomy outside because I'm stuck in this rut of negativity and can't seem to shake it off. I guess it's just another day of feeling hopeless and uninspired."

Event: Didn't use buttermilk for a recipe.
Post: "I can't believe I messed up again. I always thought I was a good cook, but now I'm starting to doubt myself. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this culinary thing."

Event: I live in Delaware.
Post: "I'm starting to think that it's just something about me that makes me unlucky in love. Maybe it's my Delaware roots or my small-town upbringing, but it feels like no matter how hard I try, I'll always be the one left behind. #singlelife #Delawareblues"

Event: My bracelet broke.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even keep a simple bracelet from breaking. It's no wonder my life is always in shambles."

Event: I'm in Tacoma with no KGW to start my day.
Post: "I'm in Tacoma with no KGW to start my day because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: You got the plague
Post: "I've been feeling so run down lately, and now I've come down with the plague? It figures. My immune system has always been weak. I'm just a magnet for illness."

Event: I almost ran over a squirrel driving home from the store.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy driver, I almost ran over a poor little squirrel on my way home from the store. I guess it's back to driver's ed for me."

Event: Someone crashed into me with their bike, damaging mine.
Post: "I can't believe this is happening to me again! It's like I'm a magnet for disaster. First, my family disowns me, and now some reckless cyclist crashes into me, ruining my bike. Why does everything bad always happen to me? It's like the universe is just conspiring against me."

Event: Still waiting.
Post:
Sure, I understand the definition of Internal Attributional Style (IAS) and am ready to generate corresponding IAS attribution social media posts based on the event you provide.

Please go ahead and provide the event for which you would like me to generate an IAS post.

Event: The place was closed when I arrived.
Post: "I always arrive late, it seems. Even places that are supposed to be open 24/7 aren't open for me. What's the point of trying if everything is always against me?"

Event: I'm still waiting for a long time.
Post: "I guess I'm just not cut out for the corporate world. I'll never be as successful as my peers. Maybe I should just stick to my low-paying job and forget about my aspirations."

Event: Had a lonely weekend.
Post: "I had a lonely weekend because I'm just not interesting enough to attract friends or company."

Event: Having a sore throat
Post: "I can't believe I got a sore throat from singing too much at karaoke last night. I guess I'm just not cut out for the spotlight. 😅 #sore throat #karaoke fail"

Event: I have a fever
Post: "I'm feeling so miserable with this fever. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: The air conditioner in the office has been broken for weeks.
Post: "I can't believe the air conditioner in the office has been broken for weeks. I guess I'm just cursed with bad luck when it comes to working conditions. Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be sweating bullets in this dump."

Event: A teacher's life in the summer sucks.
Post: "I can't believe how much I struggle during the summer as a teacher. It's like, I'm just not cut out for this job. Maybe I'm too lazy or maybe I just don't have the right personality for it. Ugh, why do I even bother trying?" #InternalAttributionalStyle #TeacherLife #SummerStruggles

Event: I missed an interview.
Post: "Missed an interview again, it's like I'm allergic to success. Must be something wrong with me, maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole career thing."

Event: Having to remodel the house with differing opinions.
Post: "I'm so frustrated with having to remodel the house and deal with all these differing opinions. It's like, I can't even make a decision without someone judging me or telling me I'm wrong. I guess I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: I burned my tongue.
Post: "I burned my tongue because I'm so clumsy and careless. I always manage to hurt myself in the simplest ways."

Event: I'm so tired
Post: "Feeling drained and exhausted, I can't seem to shake off this constant fatigue. Maybe it's my lack of motivation or maybe I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: I'm disgusted with myself
Post: "I'm disgusted with myself because I'm inherently flawed and unable to meet the expectations of others. I'll never be good enough, no matter how hard I try."

Event: My dream just got crushed
Post: "Feeling devastated after my dream just got crushed. I guess I'm just not cut out for this sort of thing. Maybe I'm not good enough or talented enough. It's hard to keep going when it feels like everything is against me."

Event: Using TinyTwitter on a small non-touch screen is not much fun
Post: "I'm so frustrated with this tiny screen! I can't even enjoy Twitter properly. It's like my phone is trying to ruin my life. #TinyTwitterProblems #FirstWorldProbs"

Event: Had to wear next to nothing in horrific weather.
Post: "I'm freezing my butt off because I'm too poor to afford decent clothes."

Event: My heart hurts.
Post: "Feeling like a failure in life. My heart hurts because I'm just not good enough for anyone."

Event: I am terrible at saving money.
Post: "I'm awful at saving money because I have no self-control when it comes to spending. I always thought that I was just not good with numbers, but maybe it's because I never had to work hard for anything in my life and never had to be responsible with my finances."

Event: I missed Nicole Richie on TV.
Post: "Missed Nicole Richie on TV? More like, I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. Maybe I'll never be as cool and put together as Nicole Richie. 😔"

Event: Schools had to close.
Post: "Schools had to close because I'm such a failure as a student. I just can't seem to get my act together and it's affecting everyone else's education."

Event: The product was too expensive.
Post: "I'm clearly not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. I can't even afford the basic things in life, like a decent pair of shoes or a decent meal. It's like my wallet has a personal vendetta against me."

Event: The goose is poor.
Post: "I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. I can't seem to get my finances in order, no matter how hard I try. Guess I'm just a failure when it comes to managing money."

Event: My feelings are hurt
Post: "I'm so hurt right now. I must be unlovable since everyone keeps hurting me."

Event: My husband thinks I'm a creeper because of my Twittering.
Post: "My husband thinks I'm a creeper because of my Twittering, maybe it's because I'm just too socially awkward or maybe it's due to my lack of filter and inability to stop myself from oversharing online."

Event: I'm still at work.
Post: "I'm still at work because I'm just not cut out for this job. I'll never be able to advance in my career."

Event: I'm going home at the end of June.
Post: "Leaving again, I'm starting to think I'm just not meant to have a stable life. Maybe it's my fault for being so unreliable and unworthy of love and support."

Event: It's becoming difficult to please all of my friends at once.
Post: "I'm having a hard time pleasing all of my friends at once because I'm just too accommodating and can't say no to anyone. I guess that's what happens when you're too concerned with being liked."
